content: We recorded GAAP net income of $11.5 million or earnings of $0.57 per basic weighted average common share an increase to net income of 45% as compared to the third quarter of 2021, where we had GAAP net income of $7.9 million or earnings of $0.48 per basic weighted average common share. For the same time period, we generated distributable earnings of $11.8 million or $0.59 per basic weighted average common share, and increased to distributable earnings of 64% as compared to distributable earnings of $7.2 million or $0.44 per basic weighted average common share for the third quarter of 2021.
